original_title: Thumb Candy: The History of Computer Games
overview: A documentary about the history of computer games. Featuring interviews with Steven Poole, Nolan Bushnell, both Space Invaders and Pac-Man creators, Clive Sinclair, Shigeru Miyamoto and Matthew Smith of Manic Miner fame. Hosted by Iain Lee.
title: Thumb Candy: The History of Computer Games
